courses.title: DSA Fundamentals
courses.description: Master data structures and algorithms with hands-on exercises and real-world applications.

courses.title: Web Development Bootcamp
courses.description: Comprehensive course covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Node.js for modern web development.

courses.title: Advanced JavaScript
courses.description: Deep dive into JavaScript concepts including closures, prototypes, async programming, and ES6+ features.

courses.title: DevOps Mastery
courses.description: Learn CI/CD pipelines, containerization with Docker, Kubernetes orchestration, and cloud deployment strategies.

courses.title: Cloud Computing Fundamentals
courses.description: Introduction to AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud with hands-on projects and infrastructure as code.

courses.title: Python for Data Science
courses.description: Learn Python programming with libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib for data analysis and visualization.

courses.title: Mobile App Development with React Native
courses.description: Build cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android using React Native and JavaScript.

courses.title: Microservices Architecture
courses.description: Design and implement scalable microservices with API gateways, service discovery, and event-driven architecture.

courses.title: Database Design and SQL Mastery
courses.description: Learn relational database design, normalization, SQL queries, indexing, and performance optimization techniques.

courses.title: Machine Learning Engineering
courses.description: Build and deploy machine learning models with TensorFlow, scikit-learn, and MLOps best practices.
